captions.text:
Why do I always wear sandals and shorts
when it is freezing outside?

I don't care about anything you've been
saying tonight
I just wanna be noticed and part of the final clubs.
You're going to think girls don't like you because you're a nerd
but really it will be because you're an (beep)-hole.
I can't believe she dumped me.
I'm gonna blog so bad about her.
Should you be hacking these servers?
Psh, I don't care about privacy.

And our father's rich. We heard about your
blog.
We wanna hire you to make our social network.
That gives me an amazing idea.
They're saying that we stole the Facebook.
Why don't you feed your chicken?

This idea is potentially worth millions
of dollars.
A million dollars isn't cool, you know what is cool?
That's not even a real number.

Do you want this? Do you want to go back
to being a joke?
I, not so secretly, hate your coolness.

Down here it's our time! It's our time,
down here.
Mr. Zuckerburg, do I have your full attention?
because I am more important than anyone in this room.
The cops, they busted me with cocaine and minors, man.
Your best friend is suing for 600 bazillion dollars.
Well I just wanted to say..

I'm bringing Facebook back. Yeah! Them
other boys don't know how to act.

title: How The Social Network Should Have Ended

comments.text: this is more how it actually ended﻿

comments.text:
Don't think people appreciate just how funny this series is...seriously, 
it's freakin' genius! And the graphics are so impressive!! It's the sort of 
short show you would see on E4 or added as an end / part of a comedy piece 
somewhere...I don't understand how you guys from the 'hishe' crew have not 
been 'picked up' yet...but I guess like all things, talent can take a while 
to be truly recognized. But you guys are truly putting the work in! Your 
audiences applaud you.﻿
